data.name: Part1.Notes2

data.name: Part10.Confirmation1
data.value:
Using Demonstration Units (non-sterile, not for human use)
for demonstration purposes only and not giving them to
final customers? (Nonfunctional implantable generators that
do not contain a battery are the only demos that can be given
to customers)

data.name: Part10.Title
data.value: Demonstration Units

data.name: Part11.Confirmation1
data.value: Ensuring that product labeling fully meet local laws

data.name: Part11.Title
data.value: Label Control

data.name: Part12.Confirmation1
data.value:
Sending its employees directly engaged in selling the
Products to attend a Boston Scientific technical training
seminar or training those employees in a program approved
by Boston Scientific within a reasonable period of time

data.name: Part12.Title
data.value: Training

data.name: Part13.Confirmation1
data.value:
Retaining all records related to the Quality Annex per the following?
- Implantable Device: indefinitely
- Equipment: Two years beyond dated removal from distribution
or as otherwise indicated by Boston Scientific
- All other products: At least Product lifetime/expiry + two years
or as otherwise indicated by Boston Scientific.

data.name: Part13.Title
data.value: Record Retention

data.value: Yes

data.name: Part2.Confirmation1
data.value: Storing product in a location secure, clean and pest free

data.name: Part2.Confirmation2
data.value:
Dedicating a Boston Scientific product storage location
limited to authorized personnel only

data.name: Part2.Confirmation3
data.value:
Maintaining the environmental conditions specified on
the product label or as defined by Boston Scientific

data.name: Part2.Confirmation4
data.value:
Contacting Boston Scientific for guidance in case of
environmental deviations

data.name: Part2.Confirmation5
data.value:
Establishing a process to prevent expired, non-conforming,
and/or quarantined Products from being sent to final customers

data.name: Part2.Title
data.value: Product storage

data.value: N/A

data.name: Part3.Confirm.Yes
data.value: Yes

data.name: Part3.Confirmation1
data.value:
Producing a complete and current list of all customers who
have purchased or consigned products from Third Party

data.name: Part3.Confirmation2
data.value:
keeping the following minimum traceability data?
• dates of purchases or consignment,
• date of implant/attempted implant of active implantables
and accessories,
• quantity,
• model number (as identified on the product label),
• lot and/or serial numbers (as identified on the product label),
• UPNs (as identified on the product label).

data.name: Part3.Confirmation3
data.value:
Keeping current and historical traceability records for
programmers and other equipment locations and movements

data.name: Part3.Confirmation4
data.value:
Reconciling consumed units at accounts with consignment
inventory

data.name: Part3.Title
data.value: Product Traceability

data.name: Part4.Confirm.Yes
data.value: Yes

data.name: Part4.Confirmation1
data.value:
Submitting implant registration forms in a timely fashion to
Boston Scientific for all active implantable medical devices
and their accessories

data.name: Part4.Title
data.value: Implant Reporting (to be completed by CRM and Neuromodulation Third Parties Only)

data.name: Part5.Confirmation1
data.value:
Keeping programmers in good working order, and returning
those requiring repair to Boston Scientific

data.name: Part5.Confirmation2
data.value:
Updating software for programmers or capital equipment
within the specified timeframe as directed by Boston Scientific

data.name: Part5.Title
data.value: Equipment Maintenance and Software Updates

data.name: Part6.Confirmation1
data.value:
Reporting complaints to Boston Scientific within
two business days

data.name: Part6.Confirmation2
data.value:
Performing and documenting at least three due diligent
attempts in cases where additional complaint information
from the customer is required

data.name: Part6.Confirmation3
data.value: Returning complaint products to Boston Scientific

data.name: Part6.Confirmation4
data.value:
Documenting at least three due dilligent attempts to
retrieve a product if the customer indicated the product
is available but has not returned it

data.name: Part6.Title
data.value: Complaint Reporting

data.name: Part7.Confirmation1
data.value:
Returning active Implantable Medical Devices and their
Accessories in biohazard controlled packaging
(as these are not to be decontaminated, disinfected or
sterilized) and under safe handling controls

data.name: Part7.Confirmation2
data.value:
Accompanying Other Medical Devices by a disinfection
certificate, even if the products have not been used, or

data.name: Part7.Confirmation3
data.value:
Returning Hazardous Products following Boston Scientific
instructions

data.name: Part7.Title
data.value: Handling Biohazardous or Hazardous Product Returns

data.name: Part8.Confirmation1
data.value:
Submitting Vigilance or other Medical Device Adverse
Event Reports to the Ministry of Health or applicable
authority within the required timeframe

data.name: Part8.Confirmation2
data.value:
Informing Boston Scientific within a reasonable period
of time of any changes to the vigilance or any other
medical device adverse event reporting requirements
within the Territory

data.name: Part8.Title
data.value: Vigilance or other Medical Device Adverse Event Reporting

data.name: Part9.Confirmation1
data.value:
Acting immediately upon receiving the notification packet
for Recalls and other field actions from Boston Scientific?
Sending an acknowledgement of the receipt of the field
action notice to Boston Scientific

data.name: Part9.Confirmation2
data.value:
Following the instructions contained in the notification
packet and ensuring that actions are carried out in
accordance with the timeframe specified

data.name: Part9.Confirmation3
data.value:
Retrieving products from the following applicable locations?
• Third Party warehouse(s) inventories
• In-transit shipments from Boston Scientific to Third Party
• Thid Party's Sales Reps inventory
• Customer locations: whether sold, consigned or samples

data.name: Part9.Confirmation4
data.value:
Performing at least three due diligent attempts to document
that the customer has received the notification and
has actioned upon instructions given by Boston Scientific

data.name: Part9.Confirmation5
data.value:
Reporting recalled stock to Boston Scientific using the verification
form contained in the notification packet once all product
retrieval actions have been completed? Matching quantities
documented on the verification forms with the units physically
returned to Boston Scientific?

data.name: Part9.Confirmation6
data.value:
Returning products to Boston Scientific following the instructions
contained in the notification packet

data.name: Part9.Title
data.value: Recalls and Other Field Actions
